Params: {2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I was... up thinking all last night.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Before we leave for the mission, I wanted to ask you... Will you go on a walk with me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "There isn't much room on the Engine for walking around.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Mr. Aston says it's a waste of space on the Engine.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia suddenly stops and stares blankly into the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "It's a transport craft preparing for departure.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "It's a regular shipment of helium-3 to Asslam... Today's the first one.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Commandant, I've been trying to figure out your team's tactics...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I think if I have enough time to acquire combat experience and tech from your team, maybe I can learn something useful... Something useful for Jamilah.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But I don't think now is the right time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Because what I hear Lucia, Liv and Lee talk about most... Isn't your leadership and combat skills, but other things.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Like... your card playing, artistic taste... You seem to know them just as well. That shows how close you all are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Ja... Someone told me that leaders need to care about their people, but they can't be too close. Otherwise, it'll affect their ability to make decisions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So I concluded that your behavior was foolish and dangerous.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But from what I saw, this is completely inconsistent with the Gray Ravens' performance in battle. This makes me believe that what you have may be different from what I once knew.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'All I can confirm is that your team is highly effective.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So my conclusion is, please allow me to stay here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Let me continue to be a part of your team... so I can learn how you communicate with each other.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '"I hope what comes back is no longer my sword or my doll, but a girl who sees the world for what it truly is."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I think this may be what Jamilah wants me to do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "I didn't transfer, so I didn't get any leave."}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "So I can't come back yet. Say hello to Aston... and Changyu."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Leave it up to the commandant. After all, Hassen promised.', 4: '1'}
